description.original: Calendar view of your daily notes

dict..setDesc(\"Choose what day of the week t: .setDesc("选择每周的起始日。选择“本地默认”以使用 moment.js 指定的默认值。")
dict..setDesc(\"Show a confirmation modal bef: .setDesc("在创建新笔记前显示确认对话框")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable this to add a column w: .setDesc("启用此选项以添加一周编号列")
dict..setDesc(\"For more syntax help, refer t: .setDesc("如需更多语法帮助，请参阅格式参考。")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose the file you want to u: .setDesc("选择要作为每周笔记模板的文件")
dict..setDesc(\"Set this if you want to use a: .setDesc("如果你想使用默认语言以外的语言，请设置此选项")
